name: cozy ribbed hood
notes:
be prepared for sudden weather changes with this versatile crochet hoodie that you can easily wear over or under coats. worked in red heart super saver brushed, there's a lovely halo finish to this cozy cowl with a deep, comfortable hood. you'll start by working the cowl portion from side to side using half double crochet in the back loop only. then, you'll join the short ends together with slip stitches to form a tube, and work around a long edge to begin the hood part. it's a wonderful gift for both teens and adults.

yarn for model:
red heart® super saver® brushed™ (5 oz/141 g; 253 yds/231 m)
dusty pink (5071) 2 balls or 370 yds/338 m
